typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Flight#} as string,
		Origin as string,
		Dest as string,
		FlightDate as string,
		NoSalesReason as string,
		TransmittingFlightAttd as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> AirlineData
AirlineData aggregate(groupBy(NoSalesReason),
	ResonCount = count(NoSalesReason),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> CountByResons
CountByResons sort(desc(ResonCount, true),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SortByCount
AirlineData filter(year(toDate(FlightDate))==2018 && NoSalesReason=="Other") ~> FilterRecordsByYearAndReason
SortByCount sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> StoreResult
FilterRecordsByYearAndReason sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> StoreFilteredRecords

source(output(
		COMPLAINT_Id as string,
		INCDNT_SRC_CD as string,
		COMPLAINT_STATUS_CD as string,
		COMPLAINT_SUBSTATUS_CD as string,
		COMPLAINT_TXT as string,
		COMPLAINT_DESC as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 filter(INCDNT_SRC_CD == 'PHONE') ~> Filter1
Filter1 split(COMPLAINT_SUBSTATUS_CD == 'In Progress',
	COMPLAINT_SUBSTATUS_CD == 'Assigned',
	disjoint: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(ComplaintStatusInProgress, ComplaintStatusAssigned, ComplaintStatusOther)
ConditionalSplit1@ComplaintStatusInProgress sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SinkInProgress
ConditionalSplit1@ComplaintStatusOther sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SinkOthers
ConditionalSplit1@ComplaintStatusAssigned sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SinkAssigned

source(output(
		{Flight#} as string,
		Origin as string,
		Dest as string,
		FlightDate as string,
		NoSalesReason as string,
		TransmittingFlightAttd as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(Generic_Reason = locate(NoSalesReason,'Other')) ~> JA186007Status
JA186007Status sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as integer,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 split(Rating > 7,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(RatingGreater7, RatingLess7)
ConditionalSplit1@RatingGreater7 derive(Recommendation = case(Rating > 7, 'Must watch', 'Can be watched')) ~> DerivedColumn1
ConditionalSplit1@RatingLess7 derive(Recommendation = 'Can be watched') ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
DerivedColumn2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2

source(output(
		{Flight#} as string,
		Origin as string,
		Dest as string,
		FlightDate as string,
		NoSalesReason as string,
		TransmittingFlightAttd as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> rimSource
rimSource derive(NoSalesReason_Other = locate(NoSalesReason, 'Other')) ~> DerivedColumnSalesReason
DerivedColumnSalesReason sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

parameters{
	FileName as string
}
source(output(
		{Flight#} as string,
		Origin as string,
		Dest as string,

source(output(
		col1 as string,
		col2 as string,
		{col3 } as string
	),
	useSchema: false,
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delimited',
	fileSystem: 'td255024',
	folderPath: 'Input',
	fileName: 'UnPivot.txt',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	quoteChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: true) ~> ColToRowSrc
ColToRowSrc derive(Col4 = split(concat(col1, ",", col2, ",", {col3 }) , ',')) ~> DerivedColumn
DerivedColumn foldDown(unroll(Col4),
	mapColumn(
		Col4
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten
Flatten sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Col1 as string,
		Col2 as string,
		Col3 as string,
		Agg_Col as short
	),
	format: 'delimited',
	fileSystem: 'td255024',
	folderPath: 'Output',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	quoteChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: true,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink4

source(output(
		name as string,
		salary as string,
		{department} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SrcEmployeeSalary
SrcEmployeeSalary sort(asc({department}, true),
	caseInsensitive: true) ~> Sort
Sort window(over({department}),
	asc(salary, true),
	RNK = denseRank()) ~> Window
Window filter(RNK == 3) ~> Filter
Filter sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		name,
		salary,
		{department}
	)) ~> sink

source(output(
		Col1 as string,
		Col2 as string,
		Col3 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SrcDuplicateFile
source(output(
		Col1 as string,
		Col2 as string,
		Col3 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SrcDuplicateFile2
SrcDuplicateFile aggregate(groupBy(Col1,
		Col2,
		Col3),
	Agg_Col = count(Col1)) ~> Aggregator
Aggregator, SrcDuplicateFile2 join(Aggregator@Col1 == SrcDuplicateFile2@Col1,
	joinType:'right',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Joiner
Joiner select(mapColumn(
		Col1 = Aggregator@Col1,
		Col2 = Aggregator@Col2,
		Col3 = Aggregator@Col3,
		Agg_Col,
		Col1 = SrcDuplicateFile2@Col1,
		Col2 = SrcDuplicateFile2@Col2,
		Col3 = SrcDuplicateFile2@Col3
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectTransformation
SelectTransformation split(Agg_Col == 1,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit@(NonDups, Dups)
ConditionalSplit@NonDups sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
ConditionalSplit@Dups sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2

source(output(
		Col1 as string,
		Col2 as string,
		Col3 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SrcDuplicateFile
Window split(ROW_NUM == 1,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit@(NonDups, Dups)
SrcDuplicateFile sort(asc(Col1, true),
	caseInsensitive: true) ~> Sort
Sort window(over(Col1),
	asc(Col1, true),
	ROW_NUM = rowNumber()) ~> Window
ConditionalSplit@NonDups sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
ConditionalSplit@Dups sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2

	output: false,
	saveOrder: 1,
	mapColumn(
		COMPANY,
		StrAgg,
		count
	)) ~> sink1
